projects.title: Student Complaint System
projects.description: The Student Complaint System is a comprehensive software application developed using a technology stack that includes React for the front end, PHP for the backend, Ant Design (antd) for the user interface components, and MySQL for database management. The system is designed to efficiently handle and streamline the process of managing student complaints within an educational institution.

projects.title: E Vault System
projects.description: The E Vault System is a dedicated web application designed to cater to the unique needs of legal professionals, specifically targeting lawyers involved in the storage and management of legal records. This project aims to provide a comprehensive solution for securely storing and organizing legal documents in a digital environment, fostering efficiency and accessibility in the legal profession.

projects.title: Assist App
projects.description: The Assistant App is a productivity-focused application built using the MERN Mobile stack, which includes MongoDB for the database, Express.js for the server, React for the front end, and Node.js for server-side scripting. This versatile application is designed to enhance users' daily productivity and organization.
